gameLogic

Class GeneralStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.GeneralStore

  • public class GeneralStore
extends java.lang.Object
    The GeneralStore class is where the player can view or purchase available merchandise. They can also view their current balance. Last modified: 13-05-2020 created: 1-05-2020
    Author:
    Kenn Leen Duenas Fulgencio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneralStore(GameEnvironment game)
      RUN setGamEnvironment IMMEDIATELY AFTER THIS! This constructor method reads in from an XML config file and populates the merchandise wrapper.

      • GeneralStore

        public GeneralStore(GameEnvironment game)
        RUN setGamEnvironment IMMEDIATELY AFTER THIS! This constructor method reads in from an XML config file and populates the merchandise wrapper. Also makes an instance of a MerchandiseWrapper class.
        Parameters:
        game - Reference to paired GameEnvironment object

      • canPurchaseCart

        public boolean canPurchaseCart(int playersMoney,
                               int finalCost,
                               MerchandiseWrapper cart)
        Checks if the player has the money and the space to buy everything in the cart
        Parameters:
        playersMoney - Amount of money player has
        finalCost - Total adjusted cost of cart
        cart - MerchandiseWrapper of merchandise in cart
        Returns:
        true if player meets all criteria to purchase the cart
